mapper.insert: insert into Delivery(user_id, product_seq, order_status, quantity, product_name, order_date, ref, location, price, branch_name) values( (select customer_seq from Customer where customer_seq = #{userId}), (select product_seq from Product where product_name = #{productName}), 0, #{quantity}, (select product_name from Product where product_name = #{productName}), now(), 0, #{location}, #{price}, #{branchName} )
mapper.select: select * from delivery where ref = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and order_status = 0
mapper.update: update Delivery set ref = #{ref}, order_status = 1 where ref = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and order_status = 0
mapper.delete: delete from Delivery where ref = 0 and user_id = #{userId} and product_name = #{productName} and order_status = 0
mapper.insert: insert delivery_list(user_id, del_ref, del_date, del_status, del_total_number, del_total_price, del_remark) values( #{userId}, #{delRef}, now(), 1, #{delTotalNumber}, #{delTotalPrice}, #{delRemark})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.seq, o.user_id, o.product_seq, o.order_status, o.quantity, o.product_name, o.ref, o.location, o.price, o.branch_name, p.del_date, p.del_status, p.del_total_number, p.del_total_price, p.del_remark FROM delivery as o inner join convenience j on o.branch_name = j.branch_name inner join delivery_list p on o.ref = p.del_ref
where j.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 1
where j.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 2
where j.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 3
where j.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 4
order by p.seq desc limit ${(pageNumber* 10)}, 10
mapper.update: update delivery as o, delivery_list as p set o.order_status = o.order_status + 1, p.del_status = p.del_status + 1 where o.ref = #{ref} and p.del_ref = #{ref}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from delivery as o inner join delivery_list p on o.ref = p.del_ref
where o.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 1
where o.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 2
where o.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 3
where o.branch_name = #{branchName} and o.order_status = 4
